title: Battlefield: Vietnam font
content:
First of all, hi, this is my first post here ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20101027085107im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
Anyway, I'm looking for the font they spelled "Vietnam" with in the Battlefield: Vietnam logo (which can be viewed here; [http://www.planetbattlefield.com/image.asp?/bf1942/bfv/ss/shots/BF-VietnamFinal.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101027085107/http:/www.planetbattlefield.com/image.asp?/bf1942/bfv/ss/shots/BF-VietnamFinal.jpg) ).   
Thanx at forehand.
author: anonymous

comments.content:
agreeing with Yves...I'm thinking you can find   
something \*similar\* from One Way Out.   
   
 [www.churchartworks.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101027085107/http:/www.churchartworks.com/)

I fear that's a custom designed logo, clearly inspired   
by the lettering of the [mother of all Vietnam movies](http://web.archive.org/web/20101027085107/http:/images.amazon.com/images/P/6305609705.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg).   
   
Maybe somebody knows of similar stuff.

Thanx, I was fearing it would be a custom...   
I'll check out the link harvey, thx again, and if anybody knows of a font similar to this, please tell me ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20101027085107im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
